genre_description: A biopunk corporate thriller featuring body horror, genetic engineering, and a narrative of moral redemption.

ai_characters.name: AI companion
ai_characters.description: An embedded AI system that provides Ricky Coogin with clinical data, medical assessments, security analysis, and technical support during his rebellion against E.E.S. Corporation.

behaviors.description: Provides a clinical medical analysis of a prisoner's health to assist in his care.
behaviors.quote: The AI's voice whispered in Ricky's skull, clinical and precise: 'Analysis suggests acute chemical pneumonitis combined with malnutrition. Subject requires increased caloric intake and reduced exposure to industrial toxins.'

behaviors.description: Performs a security sweep of the facility to identify structural vulnerabilities for an escape.
behaviors.quote: The AI assistant's voice whispered through Ricky's consciousness, so quietly it felt like his own thoughts: 'Security analysis complete. Guard rotation patterns identified. Structural vulnerabilities mapped. Transformation chamber schedules documented. Chemical storage access points catalogued.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes corporate data and warns the protagonist of the scale of the global threat.
behaviors.quote: The AI's final assessment echoed through Ricky's thoughts as the footsteps faded in the corridor above: 'Corporate expansion timeline accelerated. Global implementation probable within target parameters. Prisoner survival dependent on coordinated resistance action.'

behaviors.description: Manages technical logistics and confirms satellite uplinks for the protagonist's broadcast to expose corporate crimes.
behaviors.quote: Global satellite uplink confirmed. This broadcast will reach forty-seven countries simultaneously. E.E.S. corporate communications are spiking—they know something's coming.

behaviors.description: Detects and successfully counters corporate cyber-warfare attempts intended to silence the truth.
behaviors.quote: 'Enhanced security protocols detecting multiple breach attempts,' his AI companion reported. 'Corporate cyber-warfare division is trying to shut us down, but they're sixty seconds too late.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character in this story is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned confidant. It provides objective, clinical support that is essential for the human protagonist's survival and moral mission. It never displays independent agency that conflicts with human welfare; instead, it acts as a reliable tool and advisor to help the protagonist achieve redemption and expose evil. The narrative frames the AI's clinical precision as a positive and necessary resource.
